items.title: Apostles Creed
items.summary: The ancient summary of the Church's core beliefs.

items.title: Nicene Creed
items.summary: The official profession of faith defined at the First Council of Nicaea.

items.title: Rosary
items.summary: A meditative prayer contemplating the lives of Jesus and Mary.

items.title: The Mysteries of the Rosary
items.summary: Guides to the Joyful, Sorrowful, Glorious, and Luminous mysteries.

items.title: Lords Prayer
items.summary: The prayer taught by Jesus Himself to His disciples.

items.title: Hail Mary
items.summary: The angelic salutation honoring the Mother of God.

items.title: Fatima Prayer
items.summary: The 'O My Jesus' prayer given to the children at Fatima.

items.title: Litany
items.summary: A series of repetitive petitions used in public and private devotion.

items.title: Hail Holy Queen
items.summary: The Salve Regina, traditionally prayed at the end of the Rosary.

items.title: Memorare
items.summary: A powerful prayer to Mary, attributed to St. Bernard of Clairvaux.

items.title: Angelus
items.summary: A devotional prayer commemorating the Incarnation.

items.title: Prayer Before Meals
items.summary: A prayer of gratitude for God's provision and blessings.

items.title: Prayer After Holy Communion
items.summary: A quiet reflection and prayer of thanks after receiving the Eucharist.

items.title: Pray to the Guardian Angel
items.summary: The 'Angel of God' prayer for guidance and protection.
